content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If your system is being joined to EPAM domain or connected to EPAM network, you should have been obtained digital certificate automatically.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is important to create a backup (*.pfx file) of all your private certificates (e.g., if you have just renewed your expiring certificate) in case the original one is lost or corrupted (e.g., your operating system is reinstalled, or the hard drive crashes).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Create a backup of your digital certificate by performing the steps described in WI “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Work Instructions/Global Work Instructions/Work Instruction Data Encryption and Digital Signing.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Encryption and Digital Signing\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”, p. 2.3 Creating backup of your private certificate for Windows computers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
